attributes.action: require the BBC Trust to consider the funds allocated to the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the continuing poor performance of UK entries, which appear to be more related to political alliances than the stated requirements of the contest, we the undersigned ask the Prime Minister to have discussions with the BBC Trust with a view to reducing the payments made by the BBC to the Eurovision song contest.

If this means that the UK entry has to go through a pre-qualification process, this should be offset by a requirement that all other contestants pay more for entering the event.
